title: Ban this player please
body:
Dear Riot,

I've come into contact with this player called [REMOVED - [REPORTING OTHER PLAYERS](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules)] around high gold to low plat ranked and being in like around 3 games with him on my team now its safe to say that he's a troll that needs to be banned. He plays brand support most of his games and around half way through laning phase if any lane is losing he will be toxic and end up going to their lane and trolling them trying to take exp and cs. I just played a game with him now and its exactly what he did, I can save clip from the replay and upload it if you would like because hes ruining so many games for competitive players trying to climb.

Regards - BarnDog

replies.body:
I can't wait to see [Name Removed]

Don't name and shame, the mods don't like it

If you wanna submit a report, either

1. Use the in game report function
2. Send a ticket to Riot Support with the Clip attached
ive played with barndog before he is a fun guy so this toxic person must be a real douche
